bibl.title: Buried Linguistic Treasure in the Babatha Archive.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.note: Introduction. - Papyrological Studies, Corpus Linguistics, and Register Theory. - Register Analysis of the Babatha Archive. - Mode of Discourse and Textual Semantic Component. - Tenor of Discourse and Interpersonal Semantic Component. - Field of Discourse and Ideational Semantic Component. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: PORTER Stanley E., Buried Linguistic Treasure in the Babatha Archive.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 623-632, 6 tabl.
